+15% Chance to deal Electrical Damage when shield struck by melee enemies.
+5% Resistance to that Damage Type for 10s. Stacks up to 90%.
16% Damage taken is reflected when Blocking attacks while Channeling.
Become invulnerable for 2s and remove all Status Effects. 12s cooldown.
Create 1m seismic shockwaves from heavy landings, dealing 50 Damage and knocking foes off their feet.
Blocking absorbs 20% of incoming damage, stored as extra damage for the next charge attack.
Secondary Fire mode has a 10% chance to disarm enemies.
Lethal ground attacks cause enemies to explode dealing +250
Each Miter blade has a +22.5% chance to immediately destroy a Nullifier field.
Killing a flying enemy creates a lightning trap from their remains, lasting 2s
Converts unused ammo pickups into Shotgun ammo. Pistol/Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.
Converts unused ammo pickups into Shotgun ammo. Pistol/Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.
Enemies explode on death, dealing 75 <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive Damage (+8% Enemy Max Health) in a 2.5m radius.
Flak now bounces up to 1x and travels 15% faster.
Converts unused Ammo Pickups into Primary Weapon Ammo. Pistol <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 2.
+25% Critical Damage when inside the Marked Zone.
Slam Attacks in the Marked Zone pull all enemies within 6m.
Kavat has 15% chance to ignore Lethal Damage and be immune for 1s.
Dead maggots within 5m are consumed, restoring 1% Missing Health.
Melee Attacks gain +5% Critical Damage per Cyst.
Killing a Marked Enemy grants +15% Armor for 5s for each enemy within 7.5m.
Converts unused Ammo Pickups into Primary Weapon Ammo. Pistol <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.
Converts unused ammo pickups into Arrows. Pistol/Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.
Converts unused Ammo Pickups into Primary Weapon Ammo. Pistol <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.
Rockets disperse napalm, inflicting 5% damage over 1s across 15% of the explosion area.
Enemies explode on death, dealing 20 <DT_MAGNETIC>Magnetic Damage (+10% Enemy Max Health) in a 1.5m radius.
Status Chance fluctuates between +25% and +41% over 5s while the beam is fired.
Converts unused ammo pickups into Pistol ammo. Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.
Converts unused ammo pickups into Pistol ammo. Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.
Charge attacks now step through the rift to attack enemies up to 5m away
Increase Damage by 15% and Status Chance by 10% when attacking a prone enemy.
Enemies explode on death, dealing 50 <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage (+10% Enemy Max Health) in a 1m radius.
While blocking, redirect 25% of damage taken by allies within 2m to yourself.
Charge Attacks electrify nearby enemies for <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage equal to 30% of weapon damage.
Charge attacks get +10% Status Chance and Status Damage but drains 15 Shields per hit.
Converts 25% of Energy spent to Shields while Overshields are inactive.
Damaging an enemy will inflate the body part hit for 1s.
Rest & Rage Augment: Killing an affected enemy causes the effect to spread to enemies within 2m for 40% of the remaining duration.
Metamorphosis Augment: Equinox's other half breaks free for 7s, dealing 100% Damage.
Mend & Maim Augment: 50% of charge is conserved when switching between forms.
Pacify & Provoke Augment: Pacify converts damage done to allies into an aura that slows enemies by 20%. Provoke converts damage done to enemies into 6% extra Ability Strength.
Speed Augment: Enemies touched while sprinting under the effects of Speed will take 75 <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage with guaranteed proc.
Shock Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage to their attacks for 28s.
Electric Shield Augment: Allies can pick up Electric Shield. 25% of damage absorbed will be added to Volt's Static Discharge.
Discharge Augment: Converts 1.5% of Damage dealt into Shields split between Volt and Squadmates.
Well of Life Augment: On death, marked enemies will drop 1 Health Orbs with a 10% chance of dropping an Energy Orb.
Link Augment: Reduces Armor Rating by 25% on enemies targeted by Link.
Energy Vampire Augment: Excess Energy replenishes Shields by 85%.
Tesla Augment: Every pair of Teslas will connect forming a beam that will cause 100 <DT_SLASH>Slash Damage when contacted.
Vortex Augment: Vortex's duration is increased by 50% of its Maximum Duration for each additional Vortex thrown into it.
Bastille Augment: Enemies within the Bastille have a 50% chance to be repelled every 4s.
Turbulence Augment: Turbulence increases Movement Speed by 20% and Projectile Speed by 50% for Zephyr and her allies.
Tornado Augment: Creates 2 additional tornadoes. All tornadoes are 50% their original size and won't pick up enemies.
Tail Wind Augment: Each enemy hit increases Tail Wind Damage by 30%. Damage resets upon landing.
Toxic Lash Augment: Create 2m toxic clouds, dealing 100 <DT_POISON>Toxin/s for 8s with every kill. Damage is twice as strong for Melee kills.
Molt Augment: After casting Molt, Saryn regenerates 20 Health/s for 10s.
Spores Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive Damage to their attacks for 28s.
Scarab Swarm Augment: Scarab Armor protects Inaros from Status Effects, consuming 6% Bonus Armor for each effect resisted.
Sandstorm Augment: Sandstorm has a 25% chance of inflicting Status Effects based on the Damage Types and mods on equipped Melee Weapon.
Rhino Stomp Augment: Iron Skin Health is replenished by 55 for each enemy affected.
Rhino Charge Augment: Each enemy hit increases Rhino's Armor Rating by 12% for 4s.
Roar Augment: Enemies within 10m will suffer from a <DT_PUNCTURE>Puncture Proc.
Iron Skin Augment: Recasting Iron Skin will cause it to detonate, dealing 40% of its remaining Health as <DT_PUNCTURE>Puncture Damage, and knocking down enemies.
Prowl Augment: Ivara is able to bypass laser barriers and gains 10% Movement Speed.
Quiver Augment: Dashwire grants allies 75% Critical Damage. Cloak arrow has a 50% chance to prevent Status Effects.
Navigator Augment: Each hit increases the projectile's Critical Chance by 2.5% up to a max of 50%.
Artemis Bow Augment: Fires a single arrow that has +20% Critical Chance on Headshots and explodes in a 7m radius. Removes Punch Through.
Thurible Augment: Allies in range take 15% less Damage while channeling Thurible and grant 0.2 additional Energy charge whenever damaged.
Covenant Augment: Headshot kills increase Critical Chance bonus duration by 1s.
Tidal Surge Augment: Clears Status Effects and grants 3s of Proc Immunity for yourself and allies that come in contact with it.
Undertow Augment: Allies can enter the pool to regain 15% Health every 1.5s, with each ally in the pool increasing Energy drain on Hydroid.
Tentacle Swarm Augment: Enemies held by tentacles have a 25% chance at additional drops.
Tempest Barrage Augment: Each projectile has a 50% chance of inflicting a <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive Status Effect.
Hallowed Ground Augment: The next time this ability is cast it will consume the Hallowed Ground, dealing the remaining damage in a burst with 30% Proc Chance of <DT_RADIATION>Radiation.
Smite Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_RADIATION>Radiation Damage to their attacks for 28s.
Renewal Augment: Taking fatal damage while under the effects of Renewal will instead Heal you or allies to 20% Health. This effect triggers only once for each ally every 90s.
Reckoning Augment: Enemies affected by Reckoning spawn zones that increase Armor by 150 for allies and inflicts 100 Damage to enemies over 7s.
Teleport Augment: Teleport will perform a Finisher on the target, dealing 125% Extra Damage. 50% of Energy cost is refunded on a kill.
Smoke Screen Augment: Conceals allies for 2s.
Blade Storm Augment: Melee multiplier lasts 50% longer before it resets.
Shuriken Augment: Hits expose weaknesses on enemies, reducing their Armor by 35% for 2s.
Fire Walker Augment: Accumulate 75% of the damage Fire Walker deals, unleashing it in a trail of fire that lasts 6s.
Warding Halo Augment: Can now be cast on allies with 20% effectiveness.
Blazing Chakram Augment: Each enemy hit increases the ring's Damage by 1.25x and the chance for enemies to drop Health Orbs on death by +0.10x.
Terrify Augment: Affected enemies have 30% reduced Movement Speed.
Soul Punch Augment: Use on a downed ally to revive him with 15% Health. Nekros's Energy will be consumed.
Desecrate Augment: No longer consumes Energy, but consumes 16 Health per corpse instead.
Shadows of the Dead Augment: Each Shadow within 50m take 3% of the Damage done to Nekros in his stead.
Primal Fury Augment: Killing an enemy increases Critical Chance by 6%. The increase decays by 1%/s
Iron Jab Augment: Aiming Iron Jab at the ground launches Wukong into the air. Executing a Slam Attack increases Range by 8m and applies 300% Extra Damage.
Cloud Walker Augment: Allies within 2.5m of the cloud become invisible to enemies for 8s.
Rift Surge Augment: Limbo deals 15% Extra Damage for each enemy affected by Rift Surge while in the rift.
Cataclysm Augment: Duration increased by 0.3s for each enemy killed.
Banish Augment: Allies banished to the rift will have 10% of their Maximum Health restored.
Polarize Augment: Enemy weapons are jammed and robotics are disabled for 2s when hit by Polarize.
Pull Augment: Adds 40% chance to pull pickups towards Mag.
Crush Augment: Survivors have their Armor decreased by 20% and become unable to move for 4s.
Magnetize Augment: Manually detonate Magnetize by recasting on the target. Enemies hit have a 20% chance to become disarmed.
Switch Teleport Augment: After teleporting with an ally they will be invulnerable for 3s.
Invisibility Augment: Weapon noise is reduced by 50% while invisible.
Radial Disarm Augment: Enemies will be affected by <DT_RADIATION>Radiation for 4s.
Decoy Augment: If Loki takes fatal damage, Decoy absorbs the damage and swaps locations. Also increases Casting Speed of Decoy by 20%
Whipclaw Augment: Hitting 3 enemies will grant a 10% stacking Damage Bonus to subsequent Whipclaws. Bonus will decay after 10s.
Absorb Augment: Nyx can move at 30% Speed while using Absorb, but the area is reduced by half.
Mind Control Augment: Controlled target inflicts +200% Damage.
Psychic Bolts Augment: Affected enemies will be confused for 4s.
Chaos Augment: Enemies entering the Effect Range will be inflicted with Chaos. Effect Range lasts for 25% of the ability duration and shrinks over time.
Larva Augment: Reactivate Larva to detonate and deal 150 <DT_POISON>Toxin Damage in a 1m radius. This damage stacks for every enemy grabbed by the Larva.
Ravenous Augment: Nidus has a 35% chance of generating an additional Mutation stack whenever he gains one, while standing in the Ravenous infestation.
Sleight of Hand Augment: Ammo and Orbs pickups are turned into proximity mines that deal 150 Damage with a 15% Proc Chance.
Eclipse Augment: While active, allies within 3m gain 25% benefit from Eclipse.
Hall of Mirrors Augment: The damage of your doppelgangers is increased by 2% every time you kill an enemy.
Splinter Storm Augment: For each target affected, Splinter Storm heals 1.5 Health/s.
Freeze Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_FREEZE>Cold Damage to their attacks for 28s.
Ice Wave Augment: Leaves a frozen trail for 6s that slows down enemies that come into contact with it.
Snow Globe Augment: Enemies that enter have a 30% chance to become frozen solid for 4s.
Avalanche Augment: Grants allies within the radius with a coat of ice that absorbs 40 Damage per enemy hit.
Lantern Augment: Attracted enemies take 25% more Melee Damage.
Razorwing Augment: Flight Speed increased by 25% and Fire Rate increased by 25% for 2s when using abilities. Stacks up to 4x.
Exalted Blade Augment: Exalted Blade's Damage Type changes depending on Excalibur's Energy Color and Status Chance is increased by 25%.
Slash Dash Augment: Each enemy hit during Slash Dash further increases your Melee Counter by 1.
Radial Javelin Augment: Each enemy hit will increase Excalibur's Melee Damage by 3% for 6s.
Radial Blind Augment: Blinded enemies take 150% more Finisher Damage.
World On Fire Augment: Enemies hit have a 50% chance of being knocked down.
Accelerant Augment: Accelerant gives +20% Casting Speed and +50% <DT_FIRE>Heat damage to allies within range.
Fire Blast Augment: Damage done by Fire Blast has a 40% chance to cause enemies to panic.
Fireball Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_FIRE>Heat Damage to their attacks for 28s.
Vex Armor Augment: Taking 150 Damage will trigger a 4m burst. Shield damage will cause a <DT_PUNCTURE>Puncture Proc while Health damage will cause a <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Proc.
Effigy Augment: Cast and hold to make Effigy move to your aim point. Deals 500 Damage/s to enemies in its path and roars on arrival stunning nearby enemies.
Elemental Ward Augment: Allies that leave the radius will retain the effect for 50% of the remaining duration.
Spectral Scream Augment: Upon deactivation, Chroma will launch an elemental projectile dealing 25 Damage for each second the ability was active, to a maximum of 200 Damage.
Shooting Gallery Augment: Does a burst before switching between players, blinding enemies within 5m for 4s.
Shatter Shield Augment: Reflected bullets gain a 30% chance of staggering enemies.
Ballistic Battery Augment: Applies a 70% Status Chance bonus to the shot, based on the amount charged.
Rumblers Augment: Create a single rumbler with 120% Health, 120% Damage, and 50% Speed that taunts nearby enemies into attacking it.
Landslide Augment: Leave a trail for 7s that petrifies enemies for 4s.
Petrify Augment: Petrified enemies are scanned into the Codex and have a 10% chance to drop additional loot when killed.
Tectonics Augment: Create up to 2 walls with 70% Health. Walls can no longer be turned into boulders.
Paralysis Augment: Affected enemies are pulled towards Valkyr and the stun duration is increased by 50%.
Hysteria Augment: Use Secondary Fire to leap onto enemies up to 15m away.
Warcry Augment: While active, Warcry's duration is increased by 1.25s for each Melee Kill.
Rip Line Augment: After using Rip Line, the next 1 Rip Lines will have no Energy cost while Airborne.
Mallet Augment: Allows for two simultaneous Mallets, each with 70% reduced range.
Resonator Augment: Reactivate the ability to command Resonator to move to your aim point at 100% Speed.
Sonar Augment: Killing an enemy by shooting their weak spot will trigger another Sonar for 50% of remaining duration.
Silence Augment: Finisher Damage is increased by 150% while Silence is active.
Sonic Boom Augment: Enemy Armor is reduced by 35% for 2s.
Sound Quake Augment: Forgoes channeling to create a shockwave that deals 10x Damage at the epicenter, gradually weakening as it expands out.
Cosmic Crush Augment: The black hole saps the area of heat, freezing enemies in range. Enemies near the black hole are completely frozen for 2s.
Energy Shell Augment: Energy Shell applies to allies within 80m.
Core Vent Augment: <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage ignites exhaust fumes for 6s. Enemies passing through the flames take 200 <DT_FIRE>Heat Damage.
Worm Hole Augment: Allies that travel through wormhole gain a 30% Speed bonus for 4s.
Null Star Augment: Recasting Null Star will make all remaining particles explode, causing 60 <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage with guaranteed Proc in 4m.
Antimatter Drop Augment: Absorbs enemy bullets within 1m, increasing its damage when it explodes.
